page.title: 02GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: The children play{games}like Bulldog. Bulldog is a game to see how fast you can run and dodge other people. One person is "on". He or she stands in the middle of the playing field, and the other people have to get to the other side without being 'tigged'. If you are 'tigged' you are on with the person who tigged you, and you have to help him tig the people who are left. It carries on like that. There is another game they play. It is (hot rice - cold sago). This is a game of trying to hit other people with a small ball. If you hit them they are on and they have to hit someone else and so on. To start the game off you stand in a circle and bounce the ball. If it goes through someone's legs, then they're on.
